DOC.brief_summary: A study examine safety potential effectiveness adult stem cell investigational product , MultiStem , adult suffer ischemic stroke . The hypothesis MultiStem safe provide benefit follow ischemic stroke .
DOC.brief_title: Study Examine Effects MultiStem Ischemic Stroke
DOC.criteria: Male female subject 18 83 year age ( inclusive ) Clinical diagnosis cortical cerebral ischemic stroke Occurrence moderate moderately severe stroke Presence lacunar brainstem infarct Reduced level consciousness Major neurological event stroke clinically significant head trauma within 6 month study
